COMMENT_TX: ej,stott001,P,darlg901,Fighting with Charlie Hayes ej,hayec001,P,darlg901,Fighting with Todd Stottlemyre $Charlie Hayes was upset after hitting into a force play and was talking to himself; Todd Stottlemyre thought Hayes was talking to him; after Hayes moved to 2B on the single, Stottlemyre telled at Hayes, who charged the mound; D-Backs 3B Matt Williams grabbed Hayes and Giants 3B coach Sonny Jackson tackled Stottlemyre; both players were ejected by HP umpire Gary Darling
ej,kim-b001,P,wintm901,Foreign object in glove $Byung-Hyun Kim ejected by HP umpire Mike Winters when a bandage containing heat balm flies out of his shirt sleeve
